attributes.action: reinstate David Nutt to his position as Chief Drug Adviser.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The government have sacked David Nutt after he pointed out that ministers ignored the scientific advice given. This petition is not about the legalisation of drugs, it is about the government not listening to the advice given from appointed experts. How can we expect to make progress if the government continue to reject the opinions of their own advisers and just follow their own agenda.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
